EmailTemplate.name: Ffreedom Day Lead Registration Thankyou
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for invite for Ffreedom Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for getting in touch with us.
In response to your request for an invitation for the Ffreedom Day to be held on the 22nd August 2010, we have forwarded your request to the appropriate department.
One of our department professionals will get back to you as soon as possible.
This message is an auto-response from our contact management system. We send it to let you know that your request has reached us.
Thank you on behalf of the staff at Ffreedom Financial Planners.
Sincerely,
Team Ffreedom
Ffreedom Wealth Solutions Pvt. Ltd. 506/507, Morya Landmark II, Near Infinity Mall, Link Road, Andheri (W), Mumbai - 400 053 Tel. 022 42224333 Email: contact@ffreedom.in Website : www.ffreedom.in
